thread.title: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year
thread.title_full: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year

title: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year
text:
> Entertainment Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year FILE - In this Feb. 27, 2005 file photo, Chris Rock hosts the 77th Academy Awards telecast in Los Angeles. Rock will return to host the Oscars for a second time. The show’s producers say the prolific comedian-filmmaker will be at the helm for the 88th Academy Awards next February 28. (AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
